Description: Al Rajhi Bank (known as: Al Rajhi) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. It operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has companies operating across Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Malaysia and Jordan. Al Rajhi is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1976.
